content: just learning to tunisian crochet then the tunisian simple stitch is the place to start this stitch is very easy to learn plus it gives you a good picture of stitch anatomy and the tunisian curl this stitch is the january 2025 new year new stitch cal 1 stitch use this afghan square for blankets sweaters bags and more -------------------------- you will receive -------------------------- 1 pdf digital download file for tunisian simple stitch afghan square crochet pattern instant download as soon as payment clears ravelry s system written in english and u s crochet terms ---------------- yarn used ---------------- worsted weight yarn #4 ------------------------------------- finished measurements ------------------------------------- 6 12 or 15 after blocking ----------------- skill level ----------------- beginner ---------- notes ---------- ~gauge is included in this pattern ~this pattern has been checked for accuracy although this has been tested please note that small errors can still slip by i am happy to assist if you need any help ~this is a free pattern on my blog but you can also purchase this listing for the ad-free downloadable pdf version ~there is a complementary video tutorial 2 on youtube ----------------------- downloading ----------------------- ~download instructions~ go to my notebook and find the pattern image for this purchase and a download link will accompany it i cannot email patterns to you ------------------------ where to print ------------------------ ~ home printer ~ local copy store -
